ygData.subject: Re: [EverQuest] Playstation
ygData.msgSnippet: Anerchy Online, its a sci-fi game, i couldnt really get into though, i spent a week dl the patches and didnt like it even though i did try it for about a week,
ygData.messageBody:
Anerchy Online, its a sci-fi game, i couldnt really get into though, i  spent a week dl the patches and didnt like it even though i did try it for about a week, lucky i didnt buy it though, got it free on the coverdisk of a mag :)

i found it to be overly complicated, very laggy and really bad camera issues not to mention the really huge patch's.

its a pity to, since the background and the sci-fi thing would have been pretty cool, although there version of nano-bot magic and the limited class system wasn't so good. Anyone know if AC2 is out yet? seems to be a  new phase of lets make sequels to our never ending, open ended MMPORG, instead of just evolving them like they supposed to :)
